definition: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: Broaden and build leads to positive emotions.
The cost is estimated at more than five billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 擴建工程費用預計超過50億美元。

sentences.english: We enlarged the house by adding a west wing.
sentences.chinese: 我們加蓋西廂房以擴建房屋。

sentences.english: The project is a conversion and extension of an existing building.
sentences.chinese: 該項目是既存建築物的改建及擴建。

sentences.english: Extending landfills CANNOT solve this exigent problem, do you ageree?
sentences.chinese: 擴建堆填區不能夠解決這個急切問題，對嗎？

sentences.english: The second floor of the addition adds a new multi-purpose room with a high ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 新擴建的二層增加了一個大挑高的多功能間。

sentences.english: The process design for reconstruction and expansion engineering of Hunan Shizhuyuan Bismuth Smelter is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹湖南柿竹園公司鉍冶煉改擴建的工藝設計。

sentences.english: Expansion of Feather's Seki Plant Completed.
With the tone of success, Yip Sang added to his building.
sentences.chinese: 陪同成功的軌範，阿壽擴建了他的衡宇。

sentences.english: Dry emission of dry ash is the important problem to be solved by the newly founded or broadened power stations.
sentences.chinese: 幹灰幹排是新擴建火電廠首要解決的排灰方式。

sentences.english: The low and small houses on both sides of the road have been demolished due to its widening.
sentences.chinese: 由於街道的擴建，道路兩旁矮小的房屋全部被拆除了。

sentences.english: It expands in the spring, to the delight of New Yorkers.
sentences.chinese: 在春天裏擴建了，這讓紐約人驚喜不已。

sentences.english: Finally, suggestions to reconstruct T ditch system are provided.
sentences.chinese: 並就三溝式氧化溝改擴建提出了建議。

sentences.english: There have been different views on the extension of Huanghua Port into a large port.
sentences.chinese: 對於黃驊港能否擴建爲大港的問題曾有過不同的看法。

sentences.english: The case part, selected the Huhhot standardization pig farm as an example.
sentences.chinese: 案例部分，選取了呼和浩特市標準化豬場改擴建項目。

sentences.english: Chongqing is also expanding its airport, by adding another runway.
sentences.chinese: 重慶還擴建了其機場，添加了新的飛機跑到。

definition: running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to add to existing facilities or services
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
